sentences.en: But the brain is also phenomenally plastic.
sentences.cn: 但是大脑也具有惊人的可塑性.

sentences.en: Food production once again rose phenomenally, by 4 per cent or more a year.
sentences.cn: 食品生产再次迅速增长，年增长率达4%或更高。
他的反应准确而又迅速.

sentences.en: Interest in the subject has increased phenomenally.
sentences.cn: 人们对此事的兴趣激增.

sentences.en: Scots-born Annie, 37, has recently re-launched her phenomenally successful singing career.
sentences.cn: 生于苏格兰的安妮37岁，最近复出，再度投身于其辉煌的歌唱事业中。

sentences.en: The group have been phenomenally successful in Europe.
sentences.cn: 这个集团在欧洲非常地成功。

sentences.en: Their works are frequently related to the phenomenally rapid urbanization and urban expansion.
sentences.cn: 他们的作品大多反映疾速的都市化和都市扩张.

sentences.en: This product has been phenomenally successful.
sentences.cn: 这种产品获得了极大的成功。

words.tran_cn: 现象的；显著的；异常的；能知觉的
现象上地；明白地；从感官认识到
